page.title: 18BYFORD VILLAGE HALL
page.content: BYFORD VILLAGE HALL In 1963 the old village school was handed over to the parishes of Byford and Mansell Gamage as a Village Hall. In 1984-85 the building was decorated, floors polished, coal fired stoves removed and new heaters fitted. It is mainly used by Byford & District WI, the over 60's club, Parish Council, Garnons shooting parties and for whist drives and private parties. An import- ant event is Byford Harvest Supper when many villagers join in. BYFORD CRICKET TEAM Byford also has a cricket team drawn from the surrounding villages which plays friendly matches on most weekends during the season.
